welcome_message_body: Welcome to Roubaix, a city known for its rich textile history and charming architecture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this vibrant city has to offer!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kortrijk Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kortrijk Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lesquin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Lesquin Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Merville/Calonne Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Merville/Calonne Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
